name: Infamy
description:
by SP4R0W Description:

Welcome to Infamy! You're working for Crime.net - a collection of talented criminal robots working for mysterious mastermind Bain. Rob banks, avoid (or shoot) the cops in this top-down shooter!

Features:

  • Multiple play styles - Find a disguise and sneak through, or go loud and fight off the cops!

  • Experiment - There are lots of ways to do a bank robbery. Interrogate people, rummage round the bank and find items - the choice is yours!

  • 48 different skills, each having a basic and upgraded variant - Make your own build that suits your play style the best! You have three different loadout slots to experiment too!

  • 15 different weapons to choose from - Each weapon is also modifiable!

WARNING: If you have audio issues when playing on browser, try out the Desktop version. It provides a better and more stable experience. Thank you.

If you find any bugs, please report in comments! Thanks!
